water_bottle.name: Flask of Water
water_bottle.flavour_text: A metal flask filled with fresh water.

water_gallon.name: Gallon of Water
water_gallon.flavour_text: An old plastic gallon jug, filled to the brim with fresh water.

water_keg.name: Keg of Water
water_keg.flavour_text:
A metal keg which once held beer, but now holds water.

Breweries are far few and in between out in the wasteland, given there's barely any grain left. Distillieries and basement operations, on the other hand, are plentiful.

water_drum.name: Water Drum
water_drum.flavour_text:
A large oil drum, cleaned out and filled with fresh water. 

Oil is so rare that it can't be found in the usual places anymore.

bits_bolts.name: Bits and Bolts
bits_bolts.flavour_text: A small assortment of metal parts.

discarded_parts.name: Discarded Parts
discarded_parts.flavour_text: Small components of what might have once been a large machine.

scrap_pile.name: Pile of Scrap
scrap_pile.flavour_text: A big pile of sheet metal, reusable parts, and strange gadgets.
